verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> "You and your sons<WH1121> and your fathers<WH1>' house<WH1004> with you shall bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of the sanctuary;<WH4720> and you and your sons<WH1121> with you shall bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of your priesthood.<WH3550>

Your brothers<WH251> also,<WH4294> the tribe of Levi,<WH3878> the tribe<WH4294> of your father,<WH1> bring<WH7126> near with you,<WH3867> that they may be joined to you,<WH8334> and minister to you:<WH1121> but you and your sons with you shall be before<WH6440> the tent<WH168> of the testimony.<WH5715>

They shall keep<WH8104> your commands,<WH4931> and the duty<WH4931> of all the Tent:<WH168> only they shall not come near<WH7126> to the vessels<WH3627> of the sanctuary<WH6944> and to the altar,<WH4196> that they not die,<WH4191> neither they, nor you.

They shall be joined<WH3867> to you,<WH8104> and keep the responsibility<WH4931> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> for all the service<WH5656> of the Tent:<WH168> and a stranger<WH2114> shall not come near to you.<WH7126>
"You shall perform<WH8104> the duty<WH4931> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> and the duty<WH4931> of the altar;<WH4196> that there be no more wrath<WH7110> on the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

I,<WH3947> behold, I have taken your brothers<WH251> the Levites<WH3881> from among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> to you they are a gift,<WH4979> given<WH5414> to Yahweh,<WH3068> to do<WH5647> the service<WH5656> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>

You and your sons<WH1121> with you shall keep<WH8104> your priesthood<WH3550> for everything<WH1697> of the altar,<WH4196> and for that within<WH1004> the veil;<WH6532> and you shall serve:<WH5647> I give<WH5414> you the priesthood<WH3550> as a service<WH5656> of gift:<WH4979> and the stranger<WH2114> who comes near<WH7131> shall be put to death.<WH4191>"

Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Aaron,<WH175> "I,<WH5414> behold, I have given you the command of my wave offerings,<WH8641> even all the holy things<WH6944> of the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> to you have I given<WH5414> them by reason of the anointing,<WH4888> and to your sons,<WH1121> as a portion<WH2706> forever.<WH5769>

This shall be yours of the most<WH6944> holy things<WH6944> from the fire:<WH784> every offering<WH7133> of theirs,<WH4503> even every meal offering of theirs,<WH2403> and every sin offering of theirs,<WH817> and every trespass offering of theirs,<WH7725> which they shall render to me,<WH6944> shall be most holy<WH6944> for you and for your sons.<WH1121>
You shall eat<WH398> of it like the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> things.<WH2145> Every male shall eat<WH398> of it.<WH6944> It shall be holy to you.

"This is yours,<WH8641> too: the wave offering of their gift,<WH4976> even all the wave offerings<WH8573> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478> I have given<WH5414> them to you,<WH1121> and to your sons and to your daughters<WH1323> with you,<WH2706> as a portion forever.<WH5769> Everyone who is clean<WH2889> in your house<WH1004> shall eat of it.<WH398>

"All the best<WH2459> of the oil,<WH3323> and all the best<WH2459> of the vintage,<WH8492> and of the grain,<WH1715> the first fruits<WH7225> of them which they give<WH5414> to Yahweh,<WH3068> to you have I given them.<WH5414>

The first-ripe<WH1061> fruits of all that is in their land,<WH776> which they bring<WH935> to Yahweh,<WH3068> shall be yours;<WH2889> everyone who is clean in your house<WH1004> shall eat of it.<WH398>
"Everything devoted<WH2764> in Israel shall be yours.<WH3478>

Everything that opens<WH6363> the womb,<WH7358> of all flesh<WH1320> which they offer<WH7126> to Yahweh,<WH3068> both of man<WH120> and animal<WH929> shall be yours:<WH6299> nevertheless you shall surely redeem<WH6299> the firstborn<WH1060> of man,<WH120> and you shall redeem<WH6299> the firstborn<WH1060> of unclean<WH2931> animals.<WH929>

You shall redeem<WH6299> those who are to be redeemed<WH6299> of them from a month<WH2320> old,<WH1121> according to your estimation,<WH6187> for five<WH2568> shekels<WH8255> of money,<WH3701> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary<WH6944> (the same is twenty<WH6242> gerahs<WH1626>).

"But you shall not redeem<WH6299> the firstborn<WH1060> of a cow,<WH7794> or the firstborn<WH1060> of a sheep,<WH3775> or the firstborn<WH1060> of a goat.<WH5795> They are holy.<WH6944> You shall sprinkle<WH2236> their blood<WH1818> on the altar,<WH4196> and shall burn<WH6999> their fat<WH2459> for an offering made by fire,<WH801> for a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
Their flesh<WH1320> shall be yours,<WH8573> as the wave offering breast<WH2373> and as the right<WH3225> thigh,<WH7785> it shall be yours.

All the wave offerings<WH8641> of the holy things,<WH6944> which the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> offer<WH7311> to Yahweh,<WH3068> have I given<WH5414> you,<WH1121> and your sons and your daughters<WH1323> with you,<WH2706> as a portion forever:<WH5769> it is a covenant<WH1285> of salt<WH4417> forever<WH5769> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> to you and to your seed with you.<WH2233>"

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> "You shall have no inheritance<WH5157> in their land,<WH776> neither shall you have any portion<WH2506> among<WH8432> them.<WH2506> I am your portion and your inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

"To the children<WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878> behold,<WH5414> I have given all the tithe in Israel<WH3478> for<WH2500> an inheritance,<WH5159> in return for<WH2500> their service<WH5656> which they serve,<WH5647> even the service<WH5656> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>
Henceforth<WH5750> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall not come near<WH7126> the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> lest they bear<WH5375> sin,<WH2399> and die.<WH4191>

But the Levites<WH3881> shall do<WH5647> the service<WH5656> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> and they shall bear<WH5375> their iniquity:<WH5771> it shall be a statute<WH2708> forever<WH5769> throughout your generations;<WH1755> and among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> they shall have<WH5157> no inheritance.<WH5159>

For the tithe<WH4643> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which they offer<WH7311> as a wave offering<WH8641> to Yahweh,<WH3068> I have given<WH5414> to the Levites<WH3881> for an inheritance:<WH5159> therefore I have said<WH559> to them,<WH8432> 'Among the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> they shall have<WH5157> no inheritance.<WH5159>'"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Moreover you shall speak<WH1696> to the Levites,<WH3881> and tell<WH559> them,<WH3947> 'When you take of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> the tithe<WH4643> which I have given<WH5414> you from them for your inheritance,<WH5159> then you shall offer<WH7311> up a wave offering<WH8641> of it for Yahweh,<WH3068> a tithe<WH4643> of the tithe.<WH4643>
Your wave offering<WH8641> shall be reckoned<WH2803> to you,<WH1715> as though it were the grain of the threshing<WH1637> floor,<WH4395> and as the fullness of the winepress.<WH3342>

Thus you also shall offer<WH7311> a wave offering<WH8641> to Yahweh<WH3068> of all your tithes,<WH4643> which you receive<WH3947> of the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> and of it you shall give<WH5414> Yahweh<WH3068>'s wave offering<WH8641> to Aaron<WH175> the priest.<WH3548>
Out of all your gifts<WH4979> you shall offer<WH7311> every wave offering<WH8641> of Yahweh,<WH3068> of all its best,<WH2459> even the holy part of it out of it.<WH4720>'

"Therefore you shall tell<WH559> them,<WH7311> 'When you heave its best<WH2459> from it,<WH2803> then it shall be reckoned to the Levites<WH3881> as the increase<WH8393> of the threshing<WH1637> floor,<WH8393> and as the increase of the winepress.<WH3342>
You shall eat<WH398> it in every place,<WH4725> you and your households:<WH1004> for it is your reward<WH7939> in return for<WH2500> your service<WH5656> in the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>

You shall bear<WH5375> no sin<WH2399> by reason of it,<WH7311> when you have heaved from it its best:<WH2459> and you shall not profane<WH2490> the holy things<WH6944> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> that you not die.<WH4191>'"
